attributes.action: More things should be put in place for those with special needs within education
attributes.additional_details: Many children in the UK at this moment live with Special Educational Needs that aren't being met and are overlooked in society and remain unprovided with the help they need. Many students needs go unrecognised and  therefore placed into educational environments which are unsuitable to their needs. The government are in charge of education within the UK so they should either provide specialist educational facilities or increase funding for mainstream schools so that they can help students learn.
attributes.background: To increase facilities or the budget for current facilities to help children with Special Educational Needs. Increased funding for schools to help assist and educate SEN students in mainstream school, so they can reach their full potential.
